nio/PILDrawText.description: Draw text to an existing Python Image Library (PIL) Image.

coordinate.title: Coordinate
coordinate.description: X, Y coordinates to start text.

default.description: Same list of signals as input.

nio/PILNewImage.description: Create a new Python Image Library (PIL) Image and store it in the *image* attribute of the input signal.

size.title: Size
size.description: X, Y size of new image.

default.description: Same list of signals as input, with the added *image* attribute.

nio/PILOpenFile.description: Load an image file from disk and create a new Python Image Library (PIL) Image and store it in the *image* attribute of the input signal.

file.title: Image File
file.description: Location of image file to open

default.description: Same list of signals as input, with the added *image* attribute.
